committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To provide that sick leave may be granted to a Federal employee for the purpose of allowing that employee to assist an immediate relative having a physical or mental disability to seek medical attention.

summary.text: Authorizes the granting of sick leave to a Federal employee so that the employee can assist an immediate relative with a physical or mental disability in seeking medical attention.

titles.title: To provide that sick leave may be granted to a Federal employee for the purpose of allowing that employee to assist an immediate relative having a physical or mental disability to seek medical attention.
